name: Copycat - Memory Game
description:
Copycat is a simple and addictive game that is meant to test and improve your memory.

Follow the lighted squares and sounds as the sequence gets one square longer each round.

The more rounds you get through, the higher you score.

How much can you remember before your luck runs out?

How long can you keep up with Copycat?

Try to beat your highest score!

Perfect for playing during a few minutes of downtime, on your iDevice.

Enjoy!
